p: Significant risk factors for filovirus seropositivity among all participants (combined exposure and unexposed groups), include male sex (AOR = 3.1; 95% CI 1.01–9.5), going inside mines (AOR = 3.1; 95% CI 1.2–8.2), cleaning corpses (AOR = 3.1; 95% CI 1.04–9.1) and contact with EVD/MVD suspects (AOR = 3.9; 95% CI 1.04–14.5) (Table 2). Frequent travels (once a month) outside a persons’ home district was shown to be protective (AOR = 0.3; 95% CI 0.1–0.7).
